Package ohos.wifi.p2p

Executes or configures Wi-Fi P2P.

  • WifiP2pCallback: provides callbacks that are invoked to notify the results of Wi-Fi P2P requests.
  • WifiP2pConfig: represents the Wi-Fi P2P configuration for setting up a connection, such as the device address and passphrase.
  • WifiP2pController: provides methods for managing the Wi-Fi P2P service.
  • WifiP2pDevice: provides detailed information about the Wi-Fi P2P device, such as the device address and status.
  • WifiP2pGroup: provides detailed information about the Wi-Fi P2P group, such as the name and network ID.
  • WifiP2pNetworkInfo: provides detailed information about the Wi-Fi P2P network, such as its status.

    • Since:
    3
    • Class Summary 
      Class Description
      WifiP2pCallback
      Provides callbacks that are invoked to notify the results of Wi-Fi peer-to-peer (P2P) requests.
      WifiP2pConfig
      Represents the Wi-Fi P2P configuration for setting up a connection.
      WifiP2pController
      Provides methods for managing the Wi-Fi peer-to-peer (P2P) service.
      WifiP2pDevice
      Provides detailed information about the Wi-Fi P2P device.
      WifiP2pGroup
      Provides detailed information about the Wi-Fi P2P group.
      WifiP2pLinkedInfo
      Provides detailed information about the Wi-Fi P2P connection.
      WifiP2pNetworkInfo
      Provides detailed information about the Wi-Fi P2P network.
